sense.name: strike sharply
sense.examples: The nun rapped him on the knuckles. Jenny rapped me over the head. My mom would rap me on the head if I wasn't behaving properly. Frank rapped on the door.

sense.name: tap with fingers lightly and repeatedly
sense.examples: John rapped on the desk out of boredom. Impatience leads people to rap on surfaces while waiting. I rapped on the counter while I waited for her to return.

sense.name: perform rap music
sense.examples: 50 Cent raps for a living. I rap for fun, but I'm not good at it. Kiki rapped for a full 15 minutes without missing a beat.
